Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 11), ocaml-nox (>= 4.3.0~), ocamlbuild, cppo (>= 1.6.0), ocaml-findlib (>= 1.2.4), dh-ocaml (>= 0.9), dune, libcudf-ocaml-dev, libdose3-ocaml-dev (>= 4.0.1-2~), libre-ocaml-dev (>= 1.7.2~), libcmdliner-ocaml-dev (>= 1.0.2~), libextlib-ocaml-dev, libocamlgraph-ocaml-dev (>= 1.8), libopam-file-format-ocaml-dev, libjsonm-ocaml-dev, mccs, rsync, unzip, openssl, git, curl
Build-Depends-Indep: texlive-latex-base, texlive-lang-french, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-latex-recommended, texlive-fonts-recommended, pandoc, latex-make
Package-List: opam deb ocaml optional arch=any opam-doc deb doc optional arch=all opam-installer deb ocaml optional arch=any
